ComicInfo.Title: I Left My Stash in San Francisco; In Search of the Enigmatic George Cecil Hamilton the Third
ComicInfo.Summary:
I Left My Stash in San Francisco: A broke Stinky is dumped by Linda. He wants to get back the drugs he left under her mattress but instead winds up at Tracy's place overnight and later takes a flight to New York.
In Search of the Enigmatic George Cecil Hamilton the Third: Buddy is furious after he finds out George has mentioned him in an unflattering manner in a zine article.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:50:58. [Issue ID 305229]
